post.body: I tried the online grocery thing once, but I need to touch the vegetables, sniff, fondle, etc.
LMAO -- how does one poke BOTH eyes?
I love me some good sex.
No time for pictures! Had to eat them piping hot! :)
Just...yes.
Nice to be in fashion for once. I have never, ever liked the Marvelously Mediocre Jennifer Aniston.
@ChazFrench @danpatterson @misssomething Eating truffle fries -- sex on a plate!
Mmm....I do love a good ale.
Damn girl, you're on a tear this week!
You are so decadent it's downright sexay.
I'm very much looking forward to that! Even if it had no meat, I would eat it. But meat would rock. ;)
I am too. You are so much fun! :) I feel honored to know you.
It's "Wonder Twin powers, activate!" not "engage." Amateur.
HAHAHAHAHA....there is nothing to fear, my dear. Don't make me pinch your cheeky cheeks. :) And thank you!
So great to have three cute boys in my apartment. :) Delighted you finally got here!
Thank you sir!
I like yoga for the flexibility and pure zen that comes from it, so I'll likely go that route. Also love Pilates.
Don't cut your hair!!
I try not to do ANYTHING before the first cup. Especially answer e-mail. :)
You. Are a brat. :)
